backend/main.mo: Defines core HMS backend actor with types for roles, profiles, staff, appointments, notifications, state maps, and comparison utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old user profiles to new format by adding nurse support and transforming stored state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for admin nurse management and demo staff seeding.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptions of key frontend components, hooks, and pages used in the HMS UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, theme variables, and light/dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the HMS React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routing and role-based access for all major patient, doctor, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access denied message with navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing navigation, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Application footer with contact info, links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar showing role‑specific links and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form that collects patient name and age, saves the profile, registers the patient, and handles validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/RoleGuard.tsx: Guards route access by checking identity and user role, showing skeletons or access-denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationRefres: Hook that manually refreshes notification queries with a loading flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on profiles, doctors, nurses, patients, and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark hospital theme variables and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
Shows admin stats, appointment metrics, and panels for managing system entities with an option to seed demo data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ManageAppointme: Lists and filters all appointments across doctors and displays details with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ManageDoctorsPa: Displays existing doctors and provides a dialog to add new doctors using principal IDs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ManageNursesPan: Shows current nurses and allows adding new nurses via a modal form.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ManagePatientsP: Displays searchable patient list with basic details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ManageRolesPane: Allows assigning application roles to users by principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/AppointmentDet: Displays appointment details, allows updating status and notes, and handles loading and navigation states.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorDashboar: Shows doctor overview with counts of today, upcoming, and completed appointments plus a quick link to schedule.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorSchedule: Lists a doctor’s upcoming and past appointments with filtering, status badges, and navigation to appointment details.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that redirects authenticated users by role and showcases feature highlights with login prompts.
frontend/src/pages/patient/AppointmentsP: Displays a patient’s upcoming and past appointments with cancellation support and doctor name lookup.
frontend/src/pages/patient/BookAppointme: Provides a form for selecting doctor, date, and time to book a new appointment and submits it to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/patient/DoctorDetailP: Shows detailed doctor information and provides a button to book an appointment with that doctor.
frontend/src/pages/patient/DoctorListPag: Displays a searchable list of doctors with loading skeletons and navigation to individual profiles.
frontend/src/pages/patient/PatientDashbo: Shows patient overview including appointments, notifications, and quick navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/patient/PatientProfil: Provides viewing and editing of patient profile details with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/pages/RouteNotFound.tsx: Displays a 404 page and redirects users to their role-based dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/shared/NotificationsP: Lists user notifications with refresh and mark‑as‑seen functionality and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current HMS project state, architecture notes, and implemented features including Internet Identity auth, role-based access, and patient/doctor/admin workflows. Serves as a snapshot of requirements, design constraints, and existing functionality.
